testcase.name: Security Headers @security › response should include security headers on public page
Security Headers @security › API routes should include security headers
XSS Prevention - Client-side Validation @security @xss › DOMPurify sanitization removes script tags
XSS Prevention - Client-side Validation @security @xss › Event handlers are stripped from HTML content
XSS Prevention - Client-side Validation @security @xss › javascript: URLs are blocked
Iframe URL Validation @security @iframe › YouTube embed URLs should be allowed
Iframe URL Validation @security @iframe › YouTube-nocookie URLs should be allowed
Iframe URL Validation @security @iframe › Vimeo player URLs should be allowed
Iframe URL Validation @security @iframe › localhost URLs should be blocked for iframes
Iframe URL Validation @security @iframe › private IP addresses should be blocked
Iframe URL Validation @security @iframe › malicious look-alike domains should be blocked
SSRF Prevention Validation @security @ssrf › internal hostnames should be detected as blocked
SSRF Prevention Validation @security @ssrf › AWS/cloud metadata endpoints should be blocked
Rate Limiting @security @ratelimit › rate limit response should include Spanish error message

testcase.name: Rate Limiting @security @ratelimit › rate limit headers should be set on responses
Login Page Security @security › login page should not have any XSS vulnerabilities
Login Page Security @security › login form should use secure submission
Login Page Security @security › password input should be of type password
HTML Escape Validation @security › special characters should be properly escaped
Cookie and Session Security @security › login page sets appropriate cookie policies
